comments.comment: What happened with getting different switch options if I can't get the blue instead of the red, I'm gonna have to cancel my pledge because I absolutely can't stand the red or even worse the brown switches.

Sorry for the confusion! This switch option was added after launch in response to numerous requests, so you couldn’t choose it earlier. However, our design is hot-swappable, and we have noted that you prefer blue switches. Please don’t worry.
If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact me. Thank you!
